sqlQueries.SqlQuery: select planning_code as primaryKey, 'ip.planning_entity' as tableName, * from ip.[planning_entity]
select structure_code as primaryKey, 'ip.structure' as tableName, * from ip.structure
select workflow_id as primaryKey, 'ip.workflow' as tableName, * from ip.workflow
select dsc_code+anc_code as primaryKey, 'ip.structure_tree' as tableName, * from ip.structure_tree
select workflow_id+place as primaryKey, 'ip.wf_team' as tableName, * from ip.wf_team
